name: Quantified Us
tagline: A Guide to Collecting and Benefiting From Your Self-Tracking Data
body:
### Geolocation Data

Geolocation data can be collected automatically using a mobile device like a smartphone. Both GPS and cell tower plus wifi triangulation can be used to compute a person's coordinates.

#### Format

latitude,longitude,timestamp

#### Producers

[GPS Logger on Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mendhak.gpslogger&hl=en)
Saga, geoloqi, ???

#### Consumers

VACUMs go here
